articles.title: Greater Boston’s hottest lab building isn’t in Kendall Square. It’s in Watertown.
articles.description:
The beleaguered lab market in Greater Boston offers plenty of empty space seemingly everywhere you look. But one exception can be found — and it’s near the Newton-Watertown line.
